name: Rest In Pieces (itch)
description:
REST IN PIECES

You are trapped in town, a thief tryed to murder you but you managed to survive. Now you must dispose the corpse before the police discovers you. Make use of your items to distract the guard and make time to hide the evidence!

Controls
  • WASD or Arrows - Move the character
  • Q - Distractor
  • E - Decoy
  • F - Pick up/Drop body parts
  • Spacebar - Hide/Pick up body parts from containers
  • TAB - Zoom out/in
Instructions

You must try to keep the body parts and yourself from being seen for the cop, you can hide the body parts inside the container but be careful, the cop can search inside the containers. 

try to last as long as you can!
